Package business.entities.Monsters

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
business.entities.Monsters.Monster
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss
public class Monster extends Object
Class to represent a monster entity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, String challenge, int experience, int hitPoints, int initiative, String damageDice, String damageType)
      Constructor with the parameters to create a monster.
      Parameters:
      name - a string containing the name of the monster.
      challenge - a string containing the level of difficulty of the monster.
      experience - an integer containing the experience points this monster awards once defeated.
      hitPoints - an integer containing the health the monster has.
      initiative - an integer containing the value of speed the monster has.
      damageDice - a string containing the dice that has to be thrown to calculate its dmg(Ex: "d12").
      damageType - a string containing the type of damage the monster deals.

      Returns:
      string containing the name.

      public String getChallenge()
      Method to get the level of difficulty the monster has.
      Returns:
      string containing the level of difficulty.

      public int getExperience()
      Method to get the number of experience points the monster gives.

      public int getHitPoints()
      Method to get the health the monster has.
      Returns:
      integer containing the number of hit points.

    • addHitPoints

      public void addHitPoints(int hitPoints)
      Method to add to the health the monster has the given value.
      Parameters:
      hitPoints - integer containing the number of hit points that are going to be added.

    • getInitiative

    • getTarget

      public int getTarget(int num)
      Method to get the target the monster is going to attack.
      Parameters:
      num - integer containing the number of characters in the party.
      Returns:
      integer containing the index of the character that is going to be attacked.

    • getDamageType

      public String getDamageType()
      Method to get the damage type this monster deals.
      Returns:
      a string containing the dmg type.

    • attack

      public int attack(List<CharacterGame> characters, int target, int multiplier)
      Method to calculate the number of hit points its attack is going to do.
      Parameters:
      characters - list containing the characters in the party.
      target - integer containing the index of the character that is going to be attacked.
      multiplier - integer containing the multiplier of the damage.
      Returns:
      integer containing the number of hit points it will deal.

    • takeDamage

      public int takeDamage(int damage, String damageType)
      Method to subtract the damage taken from the hit points.
      Parameters:
      damage - integer with the number of hit points that are going to be subtracted.
      damageType - string containing the type of damage the attack taken deals.
      Returns:
      integer containing the number of hit points that has been subtracted.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Method to check if the monster is alive.
      Returns:
      true if it is alive, false if not.
